verses.translation: (1) In the name of Allāh,[2] the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.[3]
(2) [All] praise is [due] to Allāh, Lord[4] of the worlds -
(3) The Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,
(4) Sovereign of the Day of Recompense.[5]
(5) It is You we worship and You we ask for help.
(6) Guide us to the straight path -

verses.arabic_text: صِرَٰطَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غَيۡرِ ٱلۡمَغۡضُوبِ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.translation: (7) The path of those upon whom You have bestowed favor, not of those who have earned [Your] anger or of those who are astray.
